scripts.vite:build: npm run clean && npm run vite:tsc && vite build
scripts.dev: npm run vite:dev & npm run vite:serve
scripts.dev:open: npm run vite:dev & npm run vite:serve:open
scripts.prod: npm run vite:build && npm run vite:preview
scripts.prod:open: npm run vite:build && npm run vite:preview:open
scripts.check: npm run assets:check && npm run vite:tsc && npm run vite:build
scripts.test:smoke: npm run vite:build && npm run vite:preview -- --port 4173 --strictPort & npx playwright test
scripts.test:smoke:dev: npm run vite:tsc && npm run vite:serve -- --port 4173 --strictPort & npx playwright test
scripts.test:smoke:docker: docker run --rm -t -v "$PWD":/work -w /work mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.58.1-jammy bash -lc "npm ci && npm run test:smoke"
